Text.Page:
Frigid Vigil is full of dangerous allies of Thulsa.

Eliminate {@LinkCreature:32#13#Sihran arcanists} and {@LinkCreature:32#15#loyalists}, and {@LinkCreature:32#14#tuwangi froglars}.

Report in with Relinda when you've succeeded.
Thanks for all your hard work. Here's a token of our esteem.
I can't give you a reward unless you're successful.
